title: The Vampire's Favour
description: *This is part one of an ongoing story.**Contains themes of a very adult nature.*Having recently lost her mother to a long term illness, Louise is drowning under the stress of....well, everything. She feels as though her life is done before it really got going...and nothing so far has gone to plan.When she is at her lowest, with no real plan to deal with her problems...she receives an offer she can't afford to refuse."Remind me, when are you permitted to speak?"It doesn't matter what it is that he's paying her for...because it'll solve all of her problems...right?
author: S.M. Matthews
